ActJudges Act
PrecisGranting of a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to Judges of the (Ontario) Superior Court of Justice, namely the Hon. Janet M. Wilson and the Hon. Craig Perkins, from September 1, 2007 to March 31, 2008, in order to allow them to participate in the NATIONAL JUDICIAL STUDY LEAVE FELLOWSHIP PROGRAM.
